author: jsign
content:
<@402080271563751435>, added the security bits in the `Summary Statistics` table in the [verification dashboard](https://eth-act.github.io/zkevm-benchmark-runs/verification/).
I decided the dashboard to pull them at generation time  from [soundcalc](https://github.com/ethereum/soundcalc/blob/main/reports/summary.md) (mantained by the EF Cryptography team), as an unbiased source of truth for this. Some zkVMs are still working in their integration there, so their security bits will appear as soon as their PRs get merged. (George told me he has to update a bit this summary.md too)

author: taulepton_
content: <@774033563732541451> nice, wow very impressive from zisk
